Entry.JapaneseText: あのワン・ギンってオヤジ、 本当にムカツク野郎だったな……
Entry.EnglishText: That Wang Gin bastard really pissed me off...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだそんな事言ってるの？ 忘れなさいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You're still going on about it? Just forget it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>、おまえが止めるから、 収まらないんじゃねぇかよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, I can't get over it because you had to go and stop me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>が殴ったんだから、 それで充分でしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you not satisfied with <Veigue> having punched him?

Entry.JapaneseText: でもな、やっぱああいうのは おれの手で成敗してやりたかったぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: But, I wanted to teach him a lesson with my own hands over something like that.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、別におまえが謝らなくても……
Entry.EnglishText: No, you don't really need to apologize...
